Galaxy Tab 10.1” Add/Edit record demo

Oct. 28, 2011 This is a quick demo of adding and editing a record. It is a live demo - done directly on the tablet - and was recorded using Droid at Screen. MPEG Streamclip and Final Cut Express were used to process and finish the screencasts.
